vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὑδρωπ-ικός, ή, όν,
suffering from dropsy, [NT+5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: suffering with dropsy (edema, abnormal swelling from accumulated fluids)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
suffering with dropsy (edema, abnormal swelling from accumulated fluids)
with edema Lk. 14:2*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: enfermo con hidropesía (edema, hinchazón anormal producida por acumulación de líquido) ; con edema
